languages.text: {n}В Схоластика Псайкана во время вашего {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}обучения{/d} ходили истории об этом ритуале. Темные, леденящие душу истории. Этому ритуалу не учат — его постигают великими жертвами и лишениями. Вайс, очевидно, редкий пример того, кто смог принести эти жертвы и выжить.{/n}

{n}You heard tales of this practice during your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}training{/d} at the Scholastica Psykana — dark, chilling tales. This is not a ritual that is taught, for it can only be learned through great sacrifice. Weisz is obviously a rare example of someone who was able to pay the price and survive.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В Схоластика Псайкана во время вашего {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}обучения{/d} ходили истории об этом ритуале. Темные, леденящие душу истории. Этому ритуалу не учат — его постигают великими жертвами и лишениями. Вайс, очевидно, редкий пример того, кто смог принести эти жертвы и выжить.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}There were tales of this ritual during your training in the Scholastica Psykana. Dark, chilling tales. This is not a ritual that is taught, it can only be learned through great hardship and sacrifice. Weisz is obviously a rare example of someone who was able to make this sacrifice and survive.{/n}

{n}There were tales of this ritual during your training in the Scholastica Psykana. Dark, chilling tales. This is not a ritual that is taught, it can only be learned through great hardship and sacrifice. Weisz is obviously a rare example of someone who was able to make this sacrifice and survive.{/n}

{n}There were tales of this practice everywhere during your training at the Scholastica Psykana — dark, chilling tales. This is not a ritual that is taught, for it can only be learned through great personal hardship. Weisz is obviously a rare example of someone who was able to make this sacrifice and survive.{/n}

This is not a ritual that is taught, for it can only be learned through great personal hardship. Weisz is obviously a rare example of someone who was able to make this sacrifice and survive.{/n}

This is not a ritual that is taught, for it can only be learned through great sacrifice. Weisz is obviously a rare example of someone who was able to pay the price and survive.{/n}

This is not a ritual that is taught, for it can only be learned through great sacrifice. Weisz is obviously a rare example of someone who was able to pay the price and survive.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast während deiner {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}Ausbildung{/d} an der Scholastica Psykana Geschichten über diese Praxis gehört ... dunkle, beunruhigende Geschichten. Das ist kein Ritual, das gelehrt wird, denn es kann nur unter großen Opfern erlernt werden. Weisz ist offenbar ein seltenes Beispiel für jemanden, der den Preis bezahlt und überlebt hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You heard tales of this practice during your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}training{/d} at the Scholastica Psykana — dark, chilling tales. This is not a ritual that is taught, for it can only be learned through great sacrifice. Weisz is obviously a rare example of someone who was able to pay the price and survive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hast während deiner Ausbildung an der Scholastica Psykana Geschichten über diese Praxis gehört ... dunkle, beunruhigende Geschichten. Das ist kein Ritual, das gelehrt wird, denn es kann nur unter großen Opfern erlernt werden. Weisz ist offenbar ein seltenes Beispiel für jemanden, der den Preis bezahlt und überlebt hat.{/n}

{n}Du hast während deiner Ausbildung an der Scholastica Psykana Geschichten über diese Praxis gehört ... dunkle, beunruhigende Geschichten. Das ist kein Ritual, das gelehrt wird, denn es kann nur unter großen Opfern erlernt werden. Weisz ist offenbar ein seltenes Beispiel für jemanden, der den Preis bezahlt und überlebt hat.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez entendu parler de cette pratique lors de votre {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}formation{/d} à la Scholastica Psykana. Des récits pour le moindre sombres et glaçants. Ce rituel ne peut être enseigné. Il ne peut être appris qu'au prix d'un grand sacrifice. Weisz fait manifestement partie des rares élus qui ont survécu après avoir payé ce fameux prix.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You heard tales of this practice during your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}training{/d} at the Scholastica Psykana — dark, chilling tales. This is not a ritual that is taught, for it can only be learned through great sacrifice. Weisz is obviously a rare example of someone who was able to pay the price and survive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez entendu parler de cette pratique lors de votre formation à la Scholastica Psykana. Des récits pour le moindre sombres et glaçants. Ce rituel ne peut être enseigné. Il ne peut être appris qu'au prix d'un grand sacrifice. Weisz fait manifestement partie des rares élus qui ont survécu après avoir payé ce fameux prix.{/n}

{n}Vous avez entendu parler de cette pratique lors de votre formation à la Scholastica Psykana. Des récits pour le moindre sombres et glaçants. Ce rituel ne peut être enseigné. Il ne peut être appris qu'au prix d'un grand sacrifice. Weisz fait manifestement partie des rares élus qui ont survécu après avoir payé ce fameux prix.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Escuchaste historias de esta práctica mientras {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}entrenabas{/d} en el Scholastica Psykana. Eran la clase de relatos que hielan la sangre. Este ritual no se enseña, ya que para aprenderlo se requiere un gran sacrificio. Weisz es uno de los pocos que han sido capaces de pagar ese precio y vivir para contarlo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You heard tales of this practice during your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}training{/d} at the Scholastica Psykana — dark, chilling tales. This is not a ritual that is taught, for it can only be learned through great sacrifice. Weisz is obviously a rare example of someone who was able to pay the price and survive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Escuchaste historias de esta práctica mientras entrenabas en el Scholastica Psykana. Eran la clase de relatos que hielan la sangre. Este ritual no se enseña, ya que para aprenderlo se requiere un gran sacrificio. Weisz es uno de los pocos que han sido capaces de pagar ese precio y vivir para contarlo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}異能高等学究院での{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}訓練{/d}中に、この修行の話を聞いたことがあった。陰鬱でぞっとするような話だ。これは教えてもらう儀式ではなく、大きな犠牲を払うことでしか学べない。ワイズは明らかに、犠牲を払って生き延びた稀有な例なのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You heard tales of this practice during your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}training{/d} at the Scholastica Psykana — dark, chilling tales. This is not a ritual that is taught, for it can only be learned through great sacrifice. Weisz is obviously a rare example of someone who was able to pay the price and survive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}異能高等学究院での訓練中に、この修行の話を聞いたことがあった。陰鬱でぞっとするような話だ。これは教えてもらう儀式ではなく、大きな犠牲を払うことでしか学べない。ワイズは明らかに、犠牲を払って生き延びた稀有な例なのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你在灵能学会{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}接受训练{/d}的时候，曾听说过关于这种仪式的故事，那些黑暗的故事令人毛骨悚然。像这样的仪式根本无法传授，因为它只能通过巨大的牺牲才能学会。很显然，威茨是个非常罕见的个例，他居然能在付出代价之后存活下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You heard tales of this practice during your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}training{/d} at the Scholastica Psykana — dark, chilling tales. This is not a ritual that is taught, for it can only be learned through great sacrifice. Weisz is obviously a rare example of someone who was able to pay the price and survive.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你在灵能学会接受训练的时候，曾听说过关于这种仪式的故事，那些黑暗的故事令人毛骨悚然。像这样的仪式根本无法传授，因为它只能通过巨大的牺牲才能学会。很显然，威茨是个非常罕见的个例，他居然能在付出代价之后存活下来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Scholastica Psykana'da aldığın {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}eğitim{/d} esnasında bu uygulamaya dair karanlık, tüyleri diken diken eden hikâyeler işitmiştin. Bu ayin, öğretilen türden bir şey değil. Zira yalnızca muazzam bir fedakârlık neticesinde öğrenilebilir. Weisz'ın bu bedeli ödeyip hayatta kalabilen nadir kimselerden olduğu aşikâr.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You heard tales of this practice during your {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Psyker}training{/d} at the Scholastica Psykana — dark, chilling tales. This is not a ritual that is taught, for it can only be learned through great sacrifice. Weisz is obviously a rare example of someone who was able to pay the price and survive.{/n}
